channel.title: Changing XP
channel.description:
Hey, first off I want to say I did use the search bar, however; I could not find a guide that would show me how to make a 99 skill at 13.1m xp instead of 6.5m xp. I can't show any attempts on how to edit it because I have no clue.... So sorry Taharok I can't prove anything there, but if someone could help me or guide me to creating 13.1m xp the new 99, thanks. I'm not requesting you spoon-feed me but point me in the right direction? As to where I should go in the client.java to edit it.
~killerj012

item.title: Changing XP
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

… noobs. Jc tought me. Search xprate, untill you see all the cmb skills. I have homiescape base, and it was 760… I changed to a nearly 70 just to get a better economy. And it worked for me. So it should have no problem for you. Any more trouble, pm me. (:

Read full topic

item.title: Changing XP
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Search for the experiance it takes to get to 99 in a stat in all the classes if you cannot find it at all by yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing XP
item.dc:creator: @killerj012 killerj012
item.description:
@killerj012 wrote:

funkytown:

basically you want too slow it down?

Well basically, but I don’t want to just give less xp per pot/log etc they make I’d just like to make the total xp higher. Don’t ask me why lol

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @funkytown funkytown
item.description:
@funkytown wrote:

basically you want too slow it down?

item.title: Changing XP
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Nader Owner Nader
item.description:
@Owner_Nader wrote:

[quote=“killerj012, post:7, topic:285048”][quote author=Owner Nader link=topic=376738.msg2838052#msg2838052 date=1245790993]

[quote author=killerj012 link=topic=376738.msg2838048#msg2838048 date=1245790799]

client.java

search perhit.

Lol, it says it can’t find “perhit” I also tried “per hit” and still nothing.
[/quote]Lmao he mean How much xp per hit, Not the perhit word lol, Just try to att an npc and look how much xp u get then search for it in client.java and change it to this u want

That’s not what I want to know though, lol I want to change the total xp from 99 (which is 6.5m) to 13.1m not how much xp you get per point of damage.
[/quote]You Want to change max stats or what? =O
Soz but confused

I want to change the xp needed to get a 99, instead of having it be 6.5m xp needed; I’d like to make it 13.1m xp needed, to achieve a 99. I don’t know how to word it any other way, lol. :S[/quote]Umm Try to search for 6500000000 And Edit it? [suggestion ]

Read full topic

[/quote]You Want to change max stats or what? =O
Soz but confused[/quote]

I want to change the xp needed to get a 99, instead of having it be 6.5m xp needed; I’d like to make it 13.1m xp needed, to achieve a 99. I don’t know how to word it any other way, lol. :S
